member.name: INSTALLSPECTYPE
member.summary: The INSTALLSPECTYPE enumeration values define the ways a group policy application can be specified to the function. The values are used in the Type member of .

member.name: INSTALLSPECTYPE.APPNAME
member.summary: This constant equals 1. The application is specified by its display name and group policy GUID.

member.name: INSTALLSPECTYPE.FILEEXT
member.summary: The application is specified by its file name extension, for example, .jpg.
